original_text: If it be torn in pieces, then let him bring it for witness, and he shall not make good that which was torn.
korean_text: 만일 찢겼으면 그것을 가져다가 증언할 것이요 그 찢긴 것에 대하여 배상하지 아니할지니라

sentences.original_text: If it be torn in pieces
then let him bring it for witness
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 증거를 위해 그것을 가져와야 한다

sentences.original_text: and he shall not make good
